channel.title: EFIgy Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
Various bug fixes and changes, including:

  • Fixed a version comparison bug between the API results and local data.
  • Added the Sparkle framework for automatic updates.
  • Added the LetsMove framework to handle moving the app to the /Applications folder.
